Sample games

Please play our demo game for a general impression of our platform.

In addition, our platform has:

  • over two dozen games, including the classic Dictator Game, Public Goods, Prisoner's Dilemma games, ready to use
  • beautiful dynamic charts integrated (check out Lemon market)
  • simple and clean dynamic controls (check out Principal agent)

Excited about our platform? See the full list of games here.
